PerfectNetExp.abs: ...adj. 高傲无知又极端保守的；（英国报章漫画人物）毕灵普上校式的网络释义blimpish 肥胖人sheraton ['ʃerət(ə)n]

auth_sentence.content: They are filled with a kind of easy Blimpish polemics the bad scientists are fat and smelly, or atheists.
